content: *the dragons deep emerald eyes fixated him with cautious curiosity as he stared back in shock he didn t dare to breathe a wild mixture of emotions raging through his body with every beat of his heart - * **the dragon skin socks are the first pattern of the *chasing magic* sock series - a monthly free sock and story series through the whole year of 2026 you can find the full story chapter for the dragon skin socks on *my linked website *** **yarn** the socks in the pictures were made using *wolle rödel strumpfwolle color 4-fach 50g = 190m/208yds * and *wolle rödel strumpfwolle classic 4-fach superwash 50g = 190m/208yds * you can use any fingering weight sock yarn of your choice **construction** the dragon skin socks are worked cuff-down featuring an all-over texture pattern that s made up of yarn-over and knit stitches the heel used in the pattern is a classic heel-flap and gusset construction the toe used in the pattern is a classic wedged toe sewn closed at the end using kitchener stitch **difficulty** suitable for beginners the socks can be knitted in any method of your choice dpns magic loop or short 9 circulars **required skills* - long tail cast on - knitting in the round - kitchener stitch
